context: is Diablo III: Reaper of Souls Collector's Edition work with standard diablo 3 ?
response: Yes.  The collector's edition expansion will work on top of any edition of the original Diablo 3 game.

response: Yes it charges from a wall USB adapter.

context: From what I heard, is it true that this game and it's predecessor is part of the G1 canon?
response: Yes, for the most part.  It tweaks a bit but it does take place before crash landing on Earth.  It is regarded as part of G1 canon by Hasbro.

context: Is an expansion pak really necessary?
response: Depends on what games you want to play. Some games don't need it at all, some are smoother with it, and some won't run without it.

context: will this work on win 7  64 machine?

context: It this game just for online multiplayer or I can play a single mode?
response: It has a single player mode, and it is fun, but it's more fun online.
